desc: Sets the sequencer port(s) from which events are recorded
Sets the musical tempo of the MIDI file, in beats per minute
Sets the resolution of timestamps (ticks) in the MIDI file, in ticks per beat
Sets the time signature for the MIDI file
Stops the recording after receiving the given number of events
Sets the UMP MIDI protocol version.  Either 1 or 2 has to be given for MIDI 1
Read the UMP data from the given file and put them into the configuration secâ€¦
Put the given meta data text in the configuration section
